original_title: 幻色志向のためのプレリュード
overview: Using the steel of a woman's face and eyes as a basic motif, the surprising world created by the free relationship between one frame and the next is amplified by the violent collision of unintelligible female voices, etc., and directly affects our perception. The film is not theatrical, literary, or pictorial, but aims to be cinematic, and is never tied up in real-time and space, and for this reason, it has an interest not found in tested and unerring films, and not found in traditionally accepted and conventional films.
title: 幻色志向のためのプレリュード
